content: this beginner friendly cowl pattern uses just the single_crochet stitch and double_crochet stitch a video tutorial for this pattern is available on my youtube channel lightweight crochet cowl pattern 1 what comes in the pdf all pattern info on this page plus the following linked timestamps row by row for the video tutorial for easy access pictures are on a separate page so you don t have to print them with the written part of the pattern materials needed for this cowl 280 yards of a dk/ #3 lightweight weight yarn yarn used loops & threads luxe merino or lion brand mandala 4 50 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors stitch markers optional > subscribe to my newsletter 2 to be notified when new patterns come out 1 https //youtu be/npjs1ddlxta 2 https //subscribepage io/mfhzxe
